name: Penguin Random House
description: Ivanka Trump was also paid a $289,300 advance by Penguin Random House for her book, “Women Who Work,” which she donated to the Ivanka M. Trump Charitable Fund to distribute grants to support women and girls.

stories.description: Ivanka Trump was also paid a $289,300 advance by Penguin Random House for her book, “Women Who Work,” which she donated to the Ivanka M. Trump Charitable Fund to distribute grants to support women and girls.
stories.headline: Jared Kushner and Ivanka Trump made at least $82 million in outside income last year while serving in the White House, filings show
